function.name: get_weather
function.description:
Get weather information for a location, date, or specific conditions like temperature or rainfall

Examples:
- "WHATS THE CURRENT TEMPERATURE IN INDIAN VALLEY VIRGINIA"
- "WHAT IS THE HIGH TEMPERATURE FOR THE DAY"
- "MILLIMETRES OF RAINFALL TONIGHT"
- "WHATS THE WEATHER FOR NEW YORK CITY TODAY"
- "DISPLAY FORECAST FOR MOSCOW"

date_time.description: Time or date specification (e.g., 'tomorrow at 3pm', 'next Monday')

function.name: like_music

Mark a song as liked

Examples:
- "THUMPS UP CURRENT SONG"
- "THUMPS UP LAST SONG"
- "RATE THIS SONG THUMB UP"
- "PLEASE THUMPS UP THAT SONG"
- "I LIKE THIS PLAY MORE LIKE IT"

function.name: get_sunrise
function.description:
Get the sunrise time for a specific location and date

Examples:
- "WHAT TIME IS SUNDAY RISE IN DENVER COLORADO"
- "WHAT TIME DOES THE SUNDAY RISE IN HOUSTON"
- "WHEN TIME DOES THE SUNRISE IN NEW YORK"
- "CAN YOU SEE THE SUNDAY RISE THIS SATURDAY"
- "WHEN IS SUNRISE TOMORROW"

function.description:
Find a location based on name, category, or relative position
